patthana15.60:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
patthana15.60:0.3_0: Next, they place rapture and joy.
patthana15.60:1.1_0: rapture arises dependent on the skillful.
patthana15.60:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
patthana15.60:2.1_0: rapture arises dependent on the unskillful.
patthana15.60:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
patthana15.60:2.1_3: (This should be expanded as for the three roots of the following.)
